textTemplates.name: ChatterPostToContributionTypeisConversion
textTemplates.text:
@[0F970000000TiFA] 


A conversion check was received on {!$Record.Deposit_Date__c} in the amount of {!$Record.Amount__c}. This was for {!$Record.Client_Name__c}, BIS{!$Record.BIS_ID__c}.


Conv Asset Rep: {!$Record.Conv_Asset_Rep__c} 

Plan Coordinator: {!$Record.Conv_Plan_Coordinator__c}

textTemplates.name: ChatterPostToTransmissionMethodandDaysSinceDeposit
textTemplates.text: @[{!$Record.OwnerId}] The attached Reference Incoming Funds was assigned to you, which is at or past 10 days. Please process as high priority. Deposit Date- {!$Record.Deposit_Date__c} , SunGard- {!$Record.SunGard__c} and Amount- {!$Record.Amount__c}

textTemplates.name: ChatterTexttoACHisRejected
textTemplates.text: @[{!$Record.CAM_Specialist__c}] The ACH Approval Project you have submitted for SG {!$Record.SunGard__c} was rejected for the following reason: {!$Record.Rejected_Reason__c}. Please make the necessary corrections and notify me when it is complete.

textTemplates.name: ChatterTexttoClientSupportSpecialist
textTemplates.text: @[{!$Record.Client_Support_Specialist__c}] Please review the Reference Incoming Funds object for Sungard ={!$Record.SunGard__c}. A correction to the miscellaneous check request is needed. Click on the link for further information. https://paychex.my.salesforce.com/{!$Record.Id}

textTemplates.name: ManualCollectionChatterPost
textTemplates.text: @[{!$Record.CreatedById}], The Manual collection you submitted for Branch/Client # , Bis ID # {!$Record.Case_Lookup__r.Account.Bis_ID__c}, has been rejected for the following reason:{!$Record.LDPS_Rejected_Reason__c}. Please correct and resubmit a new salesforce case for processing.

textTemplates.name: ManualCollectionCompleteChatterPost
textTemplates.text: @[{!$Record.CreatedById}], The Manual collection you submitted for {!$Record.Case_Lookup__r.Account.Name} has been approved.

textTemplates.name: MiscellaneousCheckrequestwasnotprocessedChatterPost
textTemplates.text: @[{!$Record.CreatedBy.Id}] Your Miscellaneous Check request was not processed for BIS Id {!$Record.BIS_ID__c}. For additional information, review the Reference Incoming Funds object here https://paychex.my.salesforce.com/{!$Record.Id}

textTemplates.name: RejectManualCollectionChatterPost
textTemplates.text: @[{!$Record.Submitter_Name__c}] Your manual collection has been rejected by CAT Due to {!$Record.CAT_Rejected_Reason__c}. Please review the Reference Incoming Funds object {!$Record.Name} to resolve.
